sidebar_side.label: Default side
sidebar_side.info: Can be overridden with page templates

paragraph__1.content: The sidebar can be enabled for various areas of your shop. Select which locations you'd like it to appear in from the list below.

search_enter_submit.label: Go to search page when enter key is pressed

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

show_add_to_cart_button.label: Show add to cart button
show_add_to_cart_button.info: This button will only add the first available variant.

view_options_mode.label: Activate 'View options' mode
view_options_mode.info: If product has multiple variants `View option` button will be shown instead of `Add to Cart`

show_sale_sticker.label: Show sale sticker
show_sale_sticker.info: Shown when product has 'compare at' price higher than 'price'

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

enable_payment_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button
enable_payment_button.info: Lets customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_sale_sticker.label: Show sale sticker
show_sale_sticker.info: Shown when product has 'compare at' price higher than 'price'

menu.label: Lower menu
menu.info: This menu won't show dropdown items

header__1.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

header__2.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments).

exclude_tags.label: Exclude tags
exclude_tags.info: Type in the list of tags to omit from the list. Names must match the tags exactly and be separated by commas.

show_sale_sticker.label: Show sale sticker
show_sale_sticker.info: Shown when product has 'compare at' price higher than 'price'

exclude.label: Exclude collections
exclude.info: Type in the [handles](https://help.shopify.com/themes/liquid/basics/handle) for the collections you'd like to exclude from the list. Separate handles with a comma and a space e.g. collection-one, collection-two

exclude_tags.label: Exclude tags
exclude_tags.info: Type in the list of tags to omit from the list. Names must match the tags exactly and be separated by commas.

paragraph__1.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

show_sale_sticker.label: Show sale sticker
show_sale_sticker.info: Shown when product has 'compare at' price higher than 'price'

images_per_row_large.label: Images per row on large screens

logo_width.label: Logo width
logo_width.info: This width will take effect only if original logo width is equal or greather

show_tagline.label: Show tagline
show_tagline.info: Applies only on large screens, when the shop name / logo is on the left side.

show_collection_images.label: Show collection images
show_collection_images.info: When a second level menu item links to a collection, the collection image is displayed in the mega menu.

show_product_media_images.label: Show product media images
show_product_media_images.info: When a second level menu item links to a product, the product media image is displayed in the mega menu.

image_first.label: Force image to show first on mobile

images_per_row_large.label: Images per row on large screens

show_checkout_buttons_top.label: Show checkout buttons at the top as well

custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location

map_api_key.label: Google Maps API key
map_api_key.info: You’ll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map

responsive.label: Responsive
responsive.info: Responsive videos do not respect the slideshow's height setting.

vimeo_color.label: Vimeo color
vimeo_color.info: Applies only to Vimeo videos that allow you to use a custom color.
